TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 431
TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to Texas Gazette, 06-26-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: Editorial by Austin in Texas Gazette, June 26, 1830. Arguing the beneficial aspects of the law of April 6, 1830. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 431

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Editorial by Austin in Texas Gazette, June 26, 1830. Arguing the beneficial aspects of the law of April 6, 1830. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*[Texas Gazette, June 26, 1830: Attempting to allay uneasiness caused by the law of April 6,1830, and at the same time emphasizing, for its effect on the government, the services of the colonists to the nation. Omitted.]*/p*
*/div1*
